name: Chat.
greetingText: Im sorry i couldn't spend your day with you. - ps. refresh the page and click anywhere to start the background music
wishText: Im so proud of you. THANK YOU FOR BEING MY BEST FRIEND, I've got your back forever. I hope this makes your day any much better.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday angel, thank you for everything ... blah, blah, blah..
text2: That's all i was gonna do...
text3: But eh, I thought about it, then I stopped.
text4: I knew i wasn't allowed to get you any gifts, but i still wanted to do something special.
outroText: fwm n this goes straight to my IG bio....
replayText: oh and click if you wanna watch it again
